Function DB-BEGIN-TRANSACTION

Syntax:

db-begin-transaction &optional parent &key environment flags => transaction

Arguments and Values:

parent---a transaction

environment---an environment

flags---an integer

transaction---a transaction

Description:

Begins a new transaction, a child of parent, which defaults to the value of *transaction*. If environment is not supplied, the value of *environment* will be used.

See Also:

WITH-TRANSACTION.
